intro.title: AssetMantle Stakedrop
intro.description: Stakers on the nominated IBC connected chains will be rewarded with $MNTL tokens

whatIs.title: What is Stakedrop?
whatIs.description: StakeDrop is a token distribution mechanism that allows stakers of some of the most prominent Proof-of-Stake networks to get exposure to $MNTL tokens (AssetMantle tokens).
list: 9,000,000 $MNTL tokens will be distributed to participants of Stakedrop across all the six different chains.
To participate in the campaign, users will need to stake their tokes with any active validator and send a magic transaction to the designated wallet address.
All on-chain staking wallets are eligible.

steps.title: Step 1: Stake
steps.description: Stake tokens(or remain staked) with any active validator on an ongoing StakeDrop campaign chain

steps.title: Step 2: Send Magic transaction
steps.description: Send a transaction with the smallest amount of native chain token to the designated StakeDrop wallet address

steps.title: Step 3: Confirm Participation
steps.description: Enter the staked wallet address on the StakeDrop campaign dashboard to confirm your participation

steps.title: Step 4: Claim Tokens
steps.description: Answer daily quiz on the StakeDrop campaign dashboard to claim $MNTL tokens

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

QAs.a: StakeDrop is a token distribution mechanism that allows token holders of some of the most prominent Proof-of-Stake networks to get exposure to $MNTL tokens (AssetMantle tokens)

QAs.q: How many $MNTL tokens will be distributed through StakeDrop?
QAs.a: We will be distributing 9,000,000 $MNTL tokens to participants of StakeDrop across all the six different campaigns.

QAs.q: How can I participate in the AssetMantle StakeDrop?
QAs.a: To participate in StakeDrop, you need to stake your tokens with any active validator (on-chain staking) and send a magic transaction (0.00001) to the wallet address provided by us.

QAs.q: What are the six partner networks of the StakeDrop campaign?
QAs.a: Cosmos, Persistence, Terra, Comdex, Juno, Stargaze

QAs.q: Can I stake my tokens through an exchange and still be eligible to earn $MNTL rewards?
QAs.a: No, only on-chain staking will qualify to participate in the campaign

A small transaction of 0.00001 campaign native tokens (for Cosmos Campaign-ATOM) sent from your staking wallet (same wallet used to stake the native tokens) to a wallet address that will be provided on the AssetMantle StakeDrop website. This transaction is what enables participation in StakeDrop, and you start accumulating XPRT rewards only after you have sent this transaction.
Yes. All on-chain staking wallets are supported.

QAs.q: When do my rewards start accumulating?
QAs.a: You will be an active participant right after you have sent the Magic transaction of 0.001 tokens. Please note that the Magic transaction must be sent through the staking wallet address.

QAs.q: What is the vesting schedule for the $MNTL received via StakeDrop campaign?
QAs.a: $MNTL tokens distribution will commence after the 6 months of lockup period and will be linearly distributed over the next 6 months (equal tokens released each block for the period of 6 months)
